category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_derivative_name_pattern
preference.preference_description: Specifies the naming pattern with a counter for generating the names of each output structure during a "derive" operation in the CAE Manager. The pattern can be specified as a combination of fixed strings in double quotes and keywords. The keywords are "BASENAME" (corresponding to the base name specified by the user when deriving) and N (digit). The pattern must contain both keywords only once. Fixed strings are optional and can appear more than once in double quotes. Examples of pattern are: * BASENAME"-Deck"NNNN * NNN"-"BASENAME"-Deck" * NNNN"-"BASENAME The default value is BASENAME"-"NNNN.
